tool_description: Endpoint for getting the price and meta data of a product on Jumia
name: Jumia Pricing Data
title: Jumia Pricing Data

api_list.name: Jumia
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting price and meta data of a product on Jumia
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jumia-pricing-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/jumia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jumia-pricing-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://jumia-pricing-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/jumia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
